main.title: ASIA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE
main.EventInfoSubTitle: Sign up now and get 10% SRC of the sign up fee!

Reward.title: All top 8 Gets the Price
Reward.text_1: This year we will be giving out “191,155 ERNC” in total for winners around the social community. We are delighted with the response gathered from last season and fully appreciate players who are willing to help us improve Pon Pon Snake’s game experience.
Reward.text_2: Not Just the Top 3 obtain prizes, we also prepared several awards all the way to the Top 8. There will be different categories to participate in. For deeper information, you may take a look at the new distribution below:
Reward.SecretRewardText: There will be a secret reward for the Top three of Asian Champion League.

small_first.sub_2: (1)You will need to climb the ladder rank.
small_first.sub_3: Players will earn 20 tickets each cycle(two days a cycle)
small_first.sub_4: joining a battle will consume one ticket.
small_first.sub_5: Every victory will give you one point,
small_first.sub_6: you won't be getting or losing any point if you lose a game
small_first.sub_7: The top eight players will have permission for the finals
small_first.sub_8: (Players must have over 10 points for attending the finals.)

small_second.sub_2: (1)Players can team up from one to five.
small_second.sub_3: Captain can invite or dismiss any member.
small_second.sub_4: (2)You will need to climb the ladder rank.
small_second.sub_5: Six days will be a cycle.The first five
small_second.sub_6: days will be rank matches,the sixth day is the final match,
small_second.sub_8: get 100 tickets and can distribute them to all the members.
small_second.sub_9: Each team member can earn their
small_second.sub_10: own score,be automatically added to the team points.
small_second.sub_11: Joining a battle will all the wins will
small_second.sub_12: consume one ticket.Every victory will give you one point,
small_second.sub_13: you won't be getting or losing any point if you lose a game.
small_second.sub_14: (3)During the final match, each team can have four players,
small_second.sub_15: there must be at least one player attending the game to
small_second.sub_16: be recognized as a valid match.
small_second.sub_17: (4)If teams are out of tickets, there'll be more
small_second.sub_18: tickets  in the store. The leaders are allowed to

small_third.sub_2: Please enter the waiting room 5 mins before the Final begins.
small_third.sub_3: There will be Three rounds in the Final:
small_third.sub_4: ·The first round will select Final Four players.
small_third.sub_5: ·The second round will select the final three players.
small_third.sub_6: ·The last round will decide First, second, third place player.

big_first.sub_2: (1)You will need to climb the ladder rank.Players will earn 20 tickets each cycle(two days a cycle)
big_first.sub_3: joining a battle will consume one ticket.Every victory will give you one point,
big_first.sub_4: you won't be getting or losing any point if you lose a game.
big_first.sub_5: The top eight players will have permission for the finals
big_first.sub_6: (Players must have over 10 points for attending the finals.)

big_second.sub_3: (2)You will need to climb the ladder rank.Six days will be a cycle.The first five
big_second.sub_4: days will be rank matches,the sixth day is the final match,every cycle the leader will
big_second.sub_5: get 100 tickets and can distribute them to all the members.Each team member can earn their
big_second.sub_6: own score,be automatically added to the team points.Joining a battle will all the wins will
big_second.sub_7: consume one ticket.Every victory will give you one point,
big_second.sub_8: you won't be getting or losing any point if you lose a game.
big_second.sub_9: (3)During the final match, each team can have four players,
